title: The Evolution of Vietnam Agriculture: From Tradition to Modernity #VietnamAgriculture

tasks.task: Driving a four-wheeler to check the peanut crop
subtasks: Turning the key to start the four-wheeler
Guiding the four-wheeler onto the dirt path towards the peanuts
Observing the peanut plants for proper growth
Noting any discrepancies or issues in the crop

tasks.task: Planting peanuts
subtasks: Loading peanuts into the planter
Adjusting the depth and spacing settings on the planter
Securing the planter on the four-wheeler
Driving the four-wheeler through the field to plant peanuts

tasks.task: Applying fertilizer to the peanut field
subtasks: Attaching the fertilizer applicator to the four-wheeler
Connecting the fertilizer tank to the applicator
Calibration of the applicator for uniform distribution
Driving the four-wheeler through the peanut field to apply fertilizer

tasks.task: Cleaning four-wheeler after agricultural work
subtasks: Wiping down the four-wheeler to remove mud and debris
Checking the planter and applicator for any issues
Replacing any worn or damaged parts on the equipment
Storing the four-wheeler in the garage

tasks.task: Feeding cattle
subtasks: Driving the cattle to the feeding area
Distributing hay to the cattle
Ensuring all cattle have access to feed
Observing the cattle for any signs of illness or distress

tasks.task: Checking the hay bales
subtasks: Counting the number of hay bales in storage
Checking the condition of the hay bales for any spoilage
Re stacking the hay bales if necessary
Cleaning the hay storage area

tasks.task: Attaching chain to the ring on the four-wheeler
subtasks: Identifying the correct chain for the four-wheeler
Lifting the chain onto the rear wheel of the four-wheeler
Ensuring the chain is securely fastened around the ring
Tightening the chain for proper engagement

tasks.task: Transferring hay from the trailer to the barn
subtasks: Securing the trailer to the barn’s hitch
Opening the hay trailer’s door
Riding the four-wheeler with a hay bail carrier
Guiding the bail carrier into position on the four-wheeler
Repeating the process to transfer multiple hay bales

tasks.task: Collecting eggs from the chicken coop
subtasks: Opening the door to the chicken coop
Wearing appropriate footwear for safety
Handling eggs gently to avoid breakage
Storing collected eggs in a basket or container
Closing the chicken coop door securely

tasks.task: Driving a four-wheeler through the tractor
subtasks: Guiding the four-wheeler between the tractor's rows
Observing the tractor for any maintenance needs
Returning the four-wheeler to the garage

tasks.task: Working the water pump to clean hay equipment
subtasks: Starting the water pump towards the hay equipment
Monitoring the water pressure for effective cleaning
Washing the hay equipment to remove residual hay dust

tasks.task: Preparing feed for the chickens
subtasks: Measuring the required amount of feed
Mixing the feed with water or other ingredients if necessary
Distributing the feed into the chicken feeders
Ensuring all chicken feeders are filled and accessible
